TextView.android:text:
Rules: Make the number 24 from the four numbers shown. You can add, subtract, multiply and divide. Use all four numbers on the card, but use each number only once. You do not have to use all four operations. Fractions and negative numbers are possible.

Infinite Mode: Offers endless gameplay with an infinite number of random questions. The score on the top of the screen keeps track of the total number of questions the user has solved in infinite mode.

Timed Mode: Gives the user 5 minutes to solve as many questions as possible and the high score is saved.

Survival Mode: Starts the user off with a 1 minute timer. Each time the user solves a question correctly, 15 seconds are added to the timer. Survive as long as possible!

Solutions: Each mode has a solution button to show the user how to solve a hard problem. Once you run out of solutions, go to the store and watch a quick ad for more. Each ad gives the user 3 new solutions to use in any game mode.

Good luck and have fun!
